customHeadContent:
<style>
  
.waiverButtons {
    margin: 20px;
}
.waiverButtons button {
		background-color: #4d5059;
    color: white;
  	border-radius: 5px;
}
.previewSection h1 {
    float: left;
}  
@media (min-width: 750px) {
	.howitworks {
    width: 50% !important;
  }
}
.howitworks {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
    clear: left;
}
@media (min-width: 750px) {
	.reviewdetails {
    width: 50% !important;
  }
}
.reviewdetails {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
.howitworks p {
    margin: 0;
	 	line-height: 1.5rem !important; 
}  
.reviewdetails table {
    background-color: #e5e4e4;
    border-radius: 5px;
}  
/* Tables
================================== */
.Rtable {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin: 2px 2px 2px 2px;
  padding: 2px;
}
.Rtable-cell {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  flex-grow: 1;
  width: 100%;  // Default to full width
  padding: 0.8em 1.2em;
  overflow: hidden; // Or flex might break
  list-style: none;
  border: solid @bw white;
  background: fade(slategrey,20%);
  > h1, > h2, > h3, > h4, > h5, > h6 { margin: 0; }
}

/* Table column sizing
================================== */
.Rtable--7cols > .Rtable-cell { 
  width: 14.2%; 
}  
	.dayButtons a {	
  	color:#ffffff !important;
  }
  .dayButton {
  	box-shadow:inset 0px 1px 3px 0px #a6adac;
  	background:linear-gradient(to bottom, #6e6e6e 5%, #686a70 100%);
  	background-color:#6e6e6e;
  	border-radius:5px;
  	border:1px solid #4d5059;
  	display:inline-block;
  	cursor:pointer;
  	color:#ffffff;
  	font-family:Arial;
  	font-size:15px;
  	font-weight:bold;
  	text-decoration:none;
  	text-shadow:0px -1px 0px #505756;
		width: 100%;    
  }
  .dayButton:hover {
  	background:linear-gradient(to bottom, #686a70 5%, #6e6e6e 100%);
  	background-color:#686a70;
  }
  .dayButton:active, .dayButton.active {
      position: relative;
      background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #aeafb4 5%, #ece9e9 100%);
      background-color: #adafb2;
  }
  .hide {
    display: none;
    
  }
  #dayClasses {
      max-width: 400px;
      margin: auto;
  }  
  #dayClasses .classDiv {
    border-style: solid;
    border-radius: 5px;
    border-color: #e3e0e0;
    padding: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 2px;
  }  
  #dayClasses .GB2, #dayClasses .GB3 { 
		color: white;     
  }
  .classDiv .dates {
    float: left;
  }
  .classDiv .remaining {
    padding: 2px;
    background-color: white;
    float: right;
    border-radius: 4px;
  }
  .classDiv .programDiv {
      clear: left;
  }  
  .classDiv .titleDiv {
    clear: left;
  }
  .classDiv .lastline {
    clear: left;
    height: 26px;
  }
  .classDiv .lastline .studentsDiv {
    float: left;
  }
  .classDiv .lastline .booknow {
    float: right;
    box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 3px 0px #a6adac;
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #6e6e6e 5%, #686a70 100%);
    background-color: #6e6e6e;
    border-radius: 5px;
    border: 1px solid #4d5059;
    color: white;
  }
  .booknow:hover {
    box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 3px 0px #a6adac !important;
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #d4d2d2 5%, #a7a8a9 100%) !important;
    background-color: #9f9d9d !important;
    border: 1px solid #cacbcc !important;
  }
  .GB2 .remaining, .GB3 .remaining {
    color: black;
  }  
  .spinner {
    border: 16px solid #f3f3f3; /* Light grey */
    border-top: 16px solid #3498db; /* Blue */
    border-radius: 50%;
    width: 80px;
    height: 80px;
    animation: spin 2s linear infinite;
    margin: auto;
  }

  @keyframes spin {
    0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
    100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
  }

  .anotherClass, #completeBooking button {
    box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 3px 0px #a6adac;
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #6e6e6e 5%, #686a70 100%);
    background-color: #6e6e6e;
    border-radius: 5px;
    border: 1px solid #4d5059;
    color: white;  
    line-height: unset;
  }
  .anotherClass:hover, #completeBooking button:hover {
    box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 3px 0px #a6adac !important;
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #d4d2d2 5%, #a7a8a9 100%) !important;
    background-color: #9f9d9d !important;
    border: 1px solid #cacbcc !important;
  }
  #cancellationClassLink {
      color: blue;
  }  
</style>
name: Test Class

events.name: Load Form
